title: Bug cannot convert float nan to integer evaluating yoloV3
body:
Hi , please i trained yoloV3 on my custom dataset and my Weights but when i want to evaluate the model using evalute.py i get this error : 

ValueError: cannot convert float Nan to integer 

Bug : 


C:\Users\GEnElect\Desktop\Khalladi_Sofiane_VehicleDetection\Notebook>python evaluate.py -c config.json
2022-03-03 17:17:47.719967: W tensorflow/stream_executor/platform/default/dso_loader.cc:64] Could not load dynamic library 'cusolver64_11.dll'; dlerror: cusolver64_11.dll not found
2022-03-03 17:17:47.722561: W tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1835] Cannot dlopen some GPU libraries. Please make sure the missing libraries mentioned above are installed properly if you would like to use GPU. Follow the guide at https://www.tensorflow.org/install/gpu for how to download and setup the required libraries for your platform.
Skipping registering GPU devices...
2022-03-03 17:17:47.722828: I tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:142] This TensorFlow binary is optimized with oneAPI Deep Neural Network Library (oneDNN) to use the following CPU instructions in performance-critical operations:  AVX AVX2
To enable them in other operations, rebuild TensorFlow with the appropriate compiler flags.
WARNING:tensorflow:No training configuration found in the save file, so the model was *not* compiled. Compile it manually.
2022-03-03 17:17:49.641743: I tensorflow/compiler/mlir/mlir_graph_optimization_pass.cc:185] None of the MLIR Optimization Passes are enabled (registered 2)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "evaluate.py", line 68, in <module>
    _main_(args)
  File "evaluate.py", line 56, in _main_
    average_precisions = evaluate(infer_model, valid_generator)
  File "C:\Users\GEnElect\Desktop\Khalladi_Sofiane_VehicleDetection\Notebook\utils\utils.py", line 50, in evaluate
    pred_boxes = get_yolo_boxes(model, raw_image, net_h, net_w, generator.get_anchors(), obj_thresh, nms_thresh)[0]
  File "C:\Users\GEnElect\Desktop\Khalladi_Sofiane_VehicleDetection\Notebook\utils\utils.py", line 258, in get_yolo_boxes
    correct_yolo_boxes(boxes, image_h, image_w, net_h, net_w)
  File "C:\Users\GEnElect\Desktop\Khalladi_Sofiane_VehicleDetection\Notebook\utils\utils.py", line 146, in correct_yolo_boxes
    boxes[i].xmin = int((boxes[i].xmin - x_offset) / x_scale * image_w)
ValueError: cannot convert float NaN to integer
